DOC.brief_title: The Effect Of Kristeller Maneuver On Maternal And Neonatal Outcome
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly allocate two group use computer-generated random number chart : Kristeller maneuver intervention ( study ) group ( n=140 ) control group ( n=140 ) . Umbilical artery blood gas obtain assess newborn 's acid-base status . The umbilical artery level creatinine kinase , creatinine kinase myocardial specific isoform , aspartate amino transferase , alanine amino transferase , lactate dehydrogenase lactic acid measure . Length episiotomy length vagina measure 45 degree midline . Each patient 's vaginal laceration , cervical laceration , length episiotomy vagina delivery duration second stage labor minute record . Neonatal information include : infant birth weight , apgar score , baby require pediatric help , admission neonatal intensive care unit .
DOC.criteria: Pregnants administer delivery sign informed consent form include study . Pregnant require oxytocin augmentation , multiple gestation , pregnant medical problem ( asthma , thyroid , cardiac , liver , kidney disease , preeclampsia diabetes ) , pregnant previous caesarean pregnant whose estimated fetal weight < 2500gr > 4000gr include study .
